Blazing Fast Trello Search using Trello API 

Trello Search is traditionally very slow and inaccurate, so this extension uses Trello's API which is very fast to give you accurate search results in seconds. 

You just need to create a personal Trello API and Token to use it, which is free.

Currently Search Range is set to the past 5 days.
